definition: to visit/to call on/to seek/to inquire/to investigate

sentences.english: Travel Expert went to Vietnam with i-Cable's crew.
sentences.chinese: 專業旅運隨攝製隊前往越南拍攝，訪尋美食。

sentences.english: Over there, the aggrieved, jun has been seeking private detective, investigating Carrie.
sentences.chinese: 那邊廂，憤憤不平的日君已訪尋私家偵探，調查嘉莉。
